question: Analyze the impact of social media engagement on company revenue across different industries.

subtasks.task: Collect revenue data for all companies categorized by their respective industries.
Gather social media engagement metrics (likes, comments, shares) for each company from various platforms (Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, YouTube).
Integrate the revenue data with the social media engagement data to identify trends or correlations based on industry type.
Analyze the results to determine if higher social media engagement correlates with increased revenue in particular industries.
